name: expectedly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
used for saying that someone expects or expected something: The fat was expectedly very rich and it was better once you allowed it to warm up. Expectedly, reaction to the court's recent decision is mixed among the region's parents.
More examplesFewer examplesThe trial court expectedly denied the motion for a continuance on 3 January.The hotel is expectedly elegant and regularly rated the number one ski hotel in America.Offshore production will expectedly add to this figure.
